title: King Cadillac GMC Throwback 100
text: The King Cadillac GMC Throwback 100 was a <a href="NASCAR">NASCAR</a> <a href="K%26amp%3BN%20Pro%20Series%20East">K&N Pro Series East</a> race that took place at <a href="Thompson%20Speedway%20Motorsports%20Park">Thompson Speedway Motorsports Park</a> in <a href="Thompson%2C%20Connecticut">Thompson, Connecticut</a>. The race adopted its "throwback" format in 2017. On June 4, 2019, NASCAR announced the cancellation of the 2019 event. <a href="Ricky%20Craven">Ricky Craven</a> had the most triumphs of any driver, winning the event three times.
